items.sentence: The only light in the room was a dim red light.
My mother was the one who taught me how to sew.
Tom gave Mary some money to buy some chocolate.
Have you ever wondered why that doesn't happen?
We try to go to Australia at least once a year.
We've been living in Australia for a long time.
Where does your mother think you are right now?
I really liked the dance that we saw yesterday.
I don't know when the concert's going to start.
I hope you aren't going to do that by yourself.
